title: 4 Win IP boost
body:
Hello. I hope one of the Riot team members read this.

I just saw a little green thing on my account I've never seen before, hovered my mouse over it and it said I have a 4 win IP boost. This is concerning to me as I haven't bought one, and also because it used to have a thing about registering your email address to get a 4 win IP boost, and I'm wondering if someone has gained access to my account and done that. I am a bit worried by this, and would like to know how I can register my email address if someone else hasn't already done it. 

I really hope I've made a mistake here.

replies.body: its a reward for good player behaviour so enjoy it lad
I highly doubt that, i'm pretty toxic and abusive in alot of games

> I highly doubt that, i'm pretty toxic and abusive in alot of games

As long as you haven't been banned for it you will get it
Well it most likely is. So don't worry.

Im Just going to leave this here:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/rewards-positive-play

Unless your missing RP, i highly doubt  someone has "Gained access to your account" and bought you a 4-win IP boost :D

-GL,HF
